thread.title: Dholera Project

author: Mirrikh
title: Dholera Project
text:
The Dholera Project stands as a beacon of India's ambitious urban planning and development initiatives, specifically designed to transform the region into a model smart city. Located in Gujarat, Dholera is envisioned as the largest greenfield industrial city in India and a global hub for economic activities, innovation, and sustainable living.At its core, the Dholera Project aims to harness advanced technologies and modern urban planning principles to create a city that is not only efficient and environmentally sustainable but also a catalyst for economic growth. Spanning over 920 square kilometers, the project is strategically positioned between the cities of Ahmedabad, Bhavnagar, and Vadodara, enhancing its connectivity and economic potential.
